              ng-model="dynamicForm.selectedAuxClasses" theme="select2" class="attribute-ui-select" 
              ng-disabled="{{auxClassDisabled}}">
-    <ui-select-match placeholder="Click to select auxiliary class..." class="ui-select-match">

     </ui-select-match>
